name: playwright-fluent-cucumber-ts-starter
description: Starter project to write and debug cucumber-js features in TypeScript language

scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run format && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.cucumber: node ./node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --no-color --foo=bar --logLevel=error --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary --format progress-bar --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty
scripts.snippets: node ./node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format snippets --tags "@live or @snippet "

author: Henri d'Orgeval
